csr.adc

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x18
Size:
0x4
Source:
csr.rdl

Description

ADC Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31] start w 0x0 csr.adc.start
[30] done r 0x0 csr.adc.done
[29:28] - - - -
[27:16] ch1 r 0x0 csr.adc.ch1
[15:12] - - - -
[11:0] ch2 r 0x0 csr.adc.ch2

Field Descriptions

start - csr.adc.start

Control: Start ADC data transfer to DMEM (SW writes 1, HW reads)

done - csr.adc.done

Status: ADC data transfer finished (HW writes 1, SW reads)

ch1 - csr.adc.ch1

Implement the first channel for the AD converter

ch2 - csr.adc.ch2

Implement the second channel for the AD converter
